task_20.description: Place the green tissue on top of the red cup
task_20.initial_setup: The green tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the far left corner. The red cup is upright on the center of the table, 10 cm from the edge. A blue paper cup is tilted and resting on its side near the right side.
task_20.final_state: The green tissue is flat and placed directly on top of the red cup. The blue cup is upright on the far right corner.
